json-compact-prettier.maxLineLength.title: Max Line Length
json-compact-prettier.maxLineLength.description: The maximum length of a line before it is wrapped.

json-compact-prettier.indentLength.title: Indent Length
json-compact-prettier.indentLength.description: The number of spaces to use for indentation.

json-compact-prettier.bracketSpacing.title: Bracket Spacing
json-compact-prettier.bracketSpacing.description: Print spaces between brackets in objects.

json-compact-prettier.alwaysOpenKeys.title: Always Open Keys
json-compact-prettier.alwaysOpenKeys.description: A list of keys which should not be collapsed.

scripts.build: npm run compile && npx vsce package --allow-missing-repository
